articles.author: CHINEDU ASADU Associated Press
articles.title: West Africa responds to huge diphtheria outbreaks by targeting unvaccinated populations - ABC News
articles.description: Authorities in several West African countries are trying to manage their huge diphtheria outbreaks
articles.content: ABUJA, Nigeria -- Authorities in several West African countries are trying to manage their huge diphtheria outbreaks, including in Nigeria where a top health official said Thursday that millions are … [+2273 chars]
